name: Protection Duty
description:
Protection Duty is a sci-fi, ‘horde’ like arcade experience set in space!

Protect your mothership from the waves of toxic pirates using your star-fighter for as long as possible. Upgrade your star-fighter & mothership after each wave to increase chances of survival!

Protection Duty is currently under development, there are huge plans in the pipeline and I'm very excited to share it! 

Keep updated by following me on my socials!

www.linktr.ee/tcgkiwi
